segments.text: Excuse me . I wonder if you can help me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm completely lost . I'm trying to find the way to my daughter's home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please tell me where your daughter's home is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Her home is between the China hotel and Li Sheng Theater .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Turn right at the second traffic light and you will see it on your left .
segments.speaker: S2
